newsitem.title: UK: TENNIS-LEADING ODDS FOR WIMBLEDON CHAMPIONSHIPS.
newsitem.headline: TENNIS-LEADING ODDS FOR WIMBLEDON CHAMPIONSHIPS.

text.p: William Hill on Thursday for the Wimbledon lawn tennis
Men's singles: 13-8 Pete Sampras, 6-1 Richard Krajicek, 13-2
Boris Becker, 7-1 Goran Ivanisevic, 15-2 Mark Phillippousis, 9-1
Yevgeny Kafelnikov, 14-1 Patrick Rafter, 20-1 Tim Henman, 25-1
Michael Chang, 28-1 Jonas Bjorkman, 33-1 and upwards others.
Women's singles: 6-4 on Martina Hignis, 3-1 Monica Seles,
9-1 Jana Novotna, 10-1 Iva Majoli, 16-1 Lindsay Davenport,
Aranxta Sanchez-Vicario, Amanda Coetzer, 25-1 Conchita Martinez,
Anke Huber, 28-1 Mary Pierce, Mary Joe Fernandez, 33-1 and
